short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iValt, offers a safest security solution online for identity/access management.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: iVALT (validated by Gartner, Liminal) and others) is to provide the strongest identity solution through the use of biometrics, device identity  and “context” variables, all captured and verified simulateously through independent means.  This approach mitigates the risk depending on a single identity attribute.  The complexity involved in hacking multi-dimensional identity is about practicality and less about specific technologies.  Taken together, multiple attributes are prohibitively difficult for hackers and cannot be scaled for mass attacks. iVALT sees its approach as the foundation for building Zero Trustimplementation
